item.title: Littering of multiple dog waste bags in road, 28th August
item.description:
The resident at number 9 Eversley Avenue has littered 20+ dog waste bags on to the hill of Appledore Avenue as pictured. This is the second occasion that he‚Äôs done this in the past month and is unhelpful/aggressive when confronted about his behaviour and the impact on local residents.

item.title: Black graffiti on brickwork outside Lidl and Iceland, 28th August
item.description:
There has been a significant increase in graffiti around the centre of Enfield Town - some tagged ‚ÄòOTA–ü‚Äô. If the graffiti is not removed quickly it will become commonplace which will encourage more graffiti. It needs to be removed asap as it denigrates the reputation of Enfield town.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydney Road, Enfield, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti (Offensive or up to 2 meters off the ground)
